messages.body: $TSLA Sales of BEVs and PHEVs only up YoY 10% ? Cannibalization of model S and X ? Recalibrate revenues and cash flow #s.
$TSLA $gm $F $HMC It appears to me that the M-3 is cannibalizing the sales of S and X. If so, better recalibrate revenue and cash flow !

links.title: Tesla Model 3 Teardown By Engineering Firm Reveals Quality Flaws Like 'A Kia In The '90s'
links.description: For years, we've heard criticisms about Tesla's fit and finish, but now Sandy Munro-CEO of a Detroit-area consultancy that tears apart and studies automobiles-has seen a new Model 3 up close. His thoughts: "I can't imagine how they released this."

links.title: Search Results for "Tesla" | Electrek
links.description: Tesla's referral program got a midnight update today, just after the scheduled end of the previous round, which was due to end yesterday but has been extended three months. Buyers who use an owner's Tesla referral code on a new Model S or X will receive unlimited supercharging, and owners who refer a new buyer will get various awards based on the number of referrals they get, capping out at 5.
